column4: Are there other directory and file browsers like mlist and clist (which in turn are like Vernon Buerg's old MSDOS program, List)? I miss that -- probably the only thing I miss about MSDOS

there is one I use, it's called "mc", Midnight Commander......I also found one on accident that looks real similiar but is only monochome green but seems to be a clone...it's called "git"...i'd recommend you check out "mc"

I was sniffing around for a file manager and found 'vfu' - installed it and it looks very nice in a klunky retro way, a lot like the old DOS app List I remembered. Just in case you'd like something more List-y ...
